messages.content: Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
{"text": "hi"}
Hi there! How can I assist you today? Are you looking to book an appointment or inquire about our services?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
{"text": "hello"}
Hello! It's great to see you. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for a specific service or stylist?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
{"text": "hii"}
Hi there! It's great to see you. How can I assist you today? Are you looking to book a service or have any questions?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hello, how are you?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hello there, I would like to make an appointment.
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hello there, I would like to make an appointment.
Of course! I'd be happy to assist you with that. What service are you looking to book?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Which services do you offer?
We offer a variety of services including Haircuts, Hair Coloring, Styling, and Spa Treatments. Do any of these services interest you?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
I want a sparkly thing.
It sounds like you might be interested in hair coloring or highlights! Would you like to book a coloring appointment?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
yes go ahead
Great! Can you please provide me with your name?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
My name is Shresth Pandey.
Thank you, Shresth! What service are you interested in—hair coloring, highlights, or something else?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
I want to book for hair cutting.
Great choice, Shresth! Would you like to book with Riya, who specializes in haircuts and styling, or Alex, who does creative cuts?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Uh, I would like to go with Alex.

Excellent choice! When would you like to schedule your haircut with Alex? We have available slots on Monday to Saturday at 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 2:00 PM, 3:00 PM, 4:00 PM, 5:00 PM, and 6:00 PM.
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Select 10 p.m. on Monday.

It looks like there was a little mix-up with the time; we only have slots available until 7 PM. Would you like to choose a different time, such as 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, or any other time up to 6:00 PM on Monday?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Okay then, pick 10.30 AM.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but our available slots are on the hour or half-hour. Would you like to book for 10:00 AM or 11:00 AM instead?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
uh let's go with 10 am then
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hey, did you forgot I was making the appointment?
I apologize for that! Thank you for your patience. Let's get your appointment set up for 10:00 AM on Monday. What service would you like to book, and do you have a preferred stylist?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
I am looking for a haircut with Alex.
Great choice! Alex specializes in creative cuts and color. Can you please provide me with your name, the date you’d like to book for, and your email address?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
My name is Shresth Pandey. My email is shresth4236 at the red gmail.com and Select the date 7th November 2025
Thank you, Shresth! Just to confirm, you’d like to book a haircut with Alex on November 7th, 2025, at 10:00 AM. Is that correct?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Yes, that is correct. Please go ahead with scheduling my appointment.

Your appointment is confirmed! You have a haircut with Alex on November 7th, 2025, at 10:00 AM. You will receive a confirmation email shortly at shresth4236@gmail.com. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
yellooooooooow helloooooow
Hello! It's great to hear from you! How can I assist you today at Gloss and Glow Hair Salon?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hi, what services do you offer?
Hi there! We offer a range of services including Haircuts, Hair Coloring, Styling, and Spa Treatments. Is there a specific service you're interested in?

Hi there
Hi! It's great to see you. What services are you interested in today?

hello there

I am looking to book an air cut.
That sounds wonderful! Would you prefer to book with Riya, who specializes in haircuts and styling, or would you like to choose someone else?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hello, can you hear me?
Yes, I can hear you! How can I assist you today?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?

We offer a range of services including Haircuts, Hair Coloring, Styling, and Spa Treatments. Is there a specific service you’re interested in?
